# Gitignore for Jupyter + Python
਍# Ignore Jupyter notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Jupyter runtime directory
runtime/

# Python cache files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]

# Virtual environments
env/
venv/
ENV/
env.bak/
venv.bak/

# OS files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# VS Code settings
.vscode/

# Jupyter config
.profile_default/
.ipython/
.ipynb_checkpoints/
.jupyter/
